saying: You gotta break a few eggs to make an omelet.
description: Egbert is a lazy chicken villager in the Animal Crossing series who has appeared in every game to date. His name is a portmanteau of "egg", what his species lays, and the name "Bert", a nickname of "Robert". His Japanese name can mean "chilblains" or "frostbite". Egbert's favorite saying in Animal Crossing: New Leaf, which is "You gotta break a few eggs to make an omelet," means that you cannot have success without loss.
